snippet: As former Senator Chuck Hagel is grilled about his doubts on the Iraq war, some veterans of that conflict say his questions would be welcome were he to become secretary of defense.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column examines former Senator Chuck Hagel's views on the Iraq war; Hagel supporters and Iraq war veterans say his doubts about the conflict will be welcome if he becomes secretary of defense in Pres Obama's second administration.
lead_paragraph: As former Senator Chuck Hagel is grilled about his doubts on the Iraq war, some veterans of that conflict say his questions would be welcome were he to become secretary of defense.

headline.seo: Away From Battle, Appreciating a Soldier-Skeptic

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
